resources.string: Hey, it looks like you\'re a frequent user of Cat Pix! If you have a couple seconds, please rate this app in the Play Store. Every rating goes a long way towards motivating me to continue improving this app!

If you have a friend who\'s a cat lover, please share Cat Pix with them! My only goal is to put a smile on the face of every cat lover out there, which is why Cat Pix will always remain free and ad-free.
